assessment_template_create_payload.title: Cyber Resilience Assessment
assessment_template_create_payload.description: This 28-point assessment helps organizations evaluate their cybersecurity maturity, resilience posture, and cultural readiness to handle risk. It surfaces blind spots not just in tooling, but in habits, awareness, decision-making, and strategic alignment.

categories.title: Risk Culture & Awareness
categories.description: Evaluates how cyber risk is perceived and acted on within the organization — from leadership to the front lines. Strong cultures treat risk as a shared responsibility, not just an IT task.

questions.title: Leadership Involvement in Risk Conversations
questions.description: Measures whether cyber risk is discussed regularly at the leadership level — not just during incidents or audits.
questions.remediation_tips: If it's not on the agenda, tie risk to revenue, reputation, and resilience — not compliance.

criteria.description: Risk is actively discussed and owned at the top

questions.scoring_instructions: Ask: "When was the last time risk was discussed in an ELT or board meeting?"

questions.title: Employee Understanding of Cyber Risk
questions.description: Assesses how well employees understand what cyber risk looks like in their daily work — emails, links, data sharing, etc.
questions.remediation_tips: Move beyond once-a-year training. Use micro-learning, real-world examples, and team-led discussions.

criteria.description: Risk literacy is strong across roles

questions.scoring_instructions: Ask: "What would a risky behavior look like in your role?" Look for awareness, not just policy.

questions.title: Psychological Safety Around Reporting
questions.description: Evaluates whether employees feel safe reporting security concerns without fear of retribution or blame.
questions.remediation_tips: Create anonymous reporting channels and celebrate security-conscious behavior. Focus on learning, not punishment.

criteria.description: Fear of reporting or blame culture
Strong culture of reporting and learning

questions.scoring_instructions: Ask: "How do employees feel about reporting security concerns?"

questions.title: Risk Communication & Transparency
questions.description: Assesses how openly and effectively cyber risks are communicated throughout the organization.
questions.remediation_tips: Use clear, non-technical language. Share real examples and lessons learned. Make risk communication regular and accessible.
questions.scoring_instructions: Ask: "How are cyber risks communicated to employees?"

categories.title: Technical Resilience
categories.description: Evaluates the technical infrastructure and capabilities that support cyber resilience and incident response.

questions.title: Incident Detection & Response Capabilities
questions.description: Assesses the organization's ability to detect and respond to security incidents quickly and effectively.
questions.remediation_tips: Implement 24/7 monitoring, automated alerting, and well-defined incident response procedures. Conduct regular tabletop exercises.
questions.scoring_instructions: Ask: "How quickly can you detect and respond to security incidents?"

questions.title: Backup & Recovery Systems
questions.description: Evaluates the robustness of backup systems and disaster recovery procedures.
questions.remediation_tips: Implement 3-2-1 backup strategy with regular testing. Ensure backups are immutable and air-gapped.
questions.scoring_instructions: Ask: "How robust are your backup and recovery systems?"

questions.title: Security Monitoring & Logging
questions.description: Assesses the comprehensiveness of security monitoring and log collection across systems.
questions.remediation_tips: Implement centralized logging, SIEM solutions, and regular log analysis. Ensure logs are retained appropriately.
questions.scoring_instructions: Ask: "How comprehensive is your security monitoring?"

questions.title: Vulnerability Management
questions.description: Evaluates the organization's approach to identifying and remediating security vulnerabilities.
questions.remediation_tips: Implement regular vulnerability scanning, prioritization processes, and timely remediation workflows.
questions.scoring_instructions: Ask: "How do you manage security vulnerabilities?"

categories.title: Operational Resilience
categories.description: Evaluates the operational processes and procedures that support cyber resilience.

questions.title: Incident Response Planning
questions.description: Assesses the quality and comprehensiveness of incident response plans and procedures.
questions.remediation_tips: Develop detailed incident response playbooks, assign roles and responsibilities, and conduct regular training.
questions.scoring_instructions: Ask: "How comprehensive are your incident response plans?"

questions.title: Business Continuity Planning
questions.description: Evaluates the organization's business continuity and disaster recovery planning.
questions.remediation_tips: Develop comprehensive BCP documents, test recovery procedures regularly, and update plans annually.
questions.scoring_instructions: Ask: "How comprehensive is your business continuity planning?"

questions.title: Change Management Process
questions.description: Assesses the organization's change management procedures and their security implications.
questions.remediation_tips: Implement formal change management processes that include security review and testing procedures.
questions.scoring_instructions: Ask: "How do you manage changes to systems and processes?"

questions.title: Third-Party Risk Management
questions.description: Evaluates the organization's approach to managing risks from third-party vendors and partners.
questions.remediation_tips: Implement vendor risk assessment processes, monitor third-party access, and maintain vendor inventories.
questions.scoring_instructions: Ask: "How do you manage risks from third-party vendors?"

categories.title: Strategic Resilience
categories.description: Evaluates the strategic alignment and long-term planning for cyber resilience.

questions.title: Cyber Risk Integration in Strategy
questions.description: Assesses how cyber risk is integrated into overall business strategy and decision-making.
questions.remediation_tips: Include cyber risk in strategic planning, tie it to business objectives, and ensure leadership ownership.

criteria.description: Cyber risk not integrated in strategy
Cyber risk fully integrated in strategy

questions.scoring_instructions: Ask: "How is cyber risk integrated into your business strategy?"

questions.title: Investment in Cyber Resilience
questions.description: Evaluates the organization's investment in cyber resilience capabilities and resources.
questions.remediation_tips: Allocate appropriate budget and resources for cyber resilience initiatives and capabilities.
questions.scoring_instructions: Ask: "How much do you invest in cyber resilience capabilities?"

questions.title: Long-term Cyber Resilience Planning
questions.description: Assesses the organization's long-term planning for cyber resilience and capability development.
questions.remediation_tips: Develop multi-year cyber resilience roadmaps and capability development plans.
questions.scoring_instructions: Ask: "How do you plan for long-term cyber resilience?"

questions.title: Cyber Resilience Metrics & KPIs
questions.description: Evaluates the organization's approach to measuring and tracking cyber resilience performance.
questions.remediation_tips: Define meaningful cyber resilience metrics and KPIs, track them regularly, and use them for improvement.

criteria.description: No cyber resilience metrics or KPIs

questions.scoring_instructions: Ask: "How do you measure cyber resilience performance?"

categories.title: Data Protection & Privacy
categories.description: Evaluates the organization's data protection practices, privacy controls, and data governance frameworks that are essential for cyber resilience.

questions.title: Data Classification & Handling
questions.description: Assesses whether the organization has proper data classification and handling procedures in place.
questions.remediation_tips: Implement data classification framework and train employees on proper data handling procedures.

criteria.description: No data classification or handling procedures
Basic procedures exist but not consistently applied
Comprehensive data classification and handling framework

questions.scoring_instructions: Evaluate the maturity of data classification and handling procedures.

questions.title: Privacy Controls & Compliance
questions.description: Evaluates privacy controls and compliance with relevant data protection regulations.
questions.remediation_tips: Implement privacy controls and ensure compliance with relevant regulations.

criteria.description: No privacy controls or compliance measures
Some privacy controls but gaps in compliance

questions.scoring_instructions: Assess privacy controls and regulatory compliance maturity.

questions.title: Data Backup & Recovery
questions.description: Evaluates the organization's data backup and recovery capabilities.
questions.remediation_tips: Implement comprehensive backup and recovery procedures with regular testing.

criteria.description: Basic backup procedures but limited recovery testing
Comprehensive backup and recovery with regular testing

questions.scoring_instructions: Evaluate backup and recovery procedures and testing frequency.

questions.title: Data Encryption & Security
questions.description: Assesses the use of encryption and security measures to protect sensitive data.
questions.remediation_tips: Implement encryption for data at rest and in transit, with proper key management.

criteria.description: No encryption or data security measures

questions.scoring_instructions: Assess encryption implementation and data security measures.

categories.title: Network Security & Infrastructure
categories.description: Evaluates the organization's network security posture, infrastructure protection, and network monitoring capabilities.

questions.title: Network Segmentation & Controls
questions.description: Assesses network segmentation and access controls to protect critical systems.
questions.remediation_tips: Implement network segmentation and access controls to isolate critical systems.

criteria.description: No network segmentation or access controls

questions.scoring_instructions: Evaluate network segmentation and access control implementation.

questions.title: Firewall & Network Monitoring
questions.description: Evaluates firewall configuration and network monitoring capabilities.
questions.remediation_tips: Implement comprehensive firewall rules and network monitoring solutions.
questions.scoring_instructions: Assess firewall configuration and network monitoring capabilities.

questions.title: Wireless Network Security
questions.description: Evaluates the security of wireless networks and mobile device access.
questions.remediation_tips: Implement secure wireless networks with proper authentication and encryption.

criteria.description: No wireless security or open networks
Basic wireless security but vulnerabilities exist

questions.scoring_instructions: Evaluate wireless network security and mobile device management.

questions.title: Cloud Infrastructure Security
questions.description: Assesses security controls for cloud infrastructure and services.
questions.remediation_tips: Implement cloud security controls and monitoring for all cloud services.

criteria.description: No cloud security controls or monitoring
Some cloud security but gaps exist

questions.scoring_instructions: Assess cloud infrastructure security and monitoring capabilities.

categories.title: Access Controls & Identity Management
categories.description: Evaluates identity and access management practices, authentication controls, and privilege management.

questions.title: Multi-Factor Authentication
questions.description: Assesses the implementation of multi-factor authentication across systems.
questions.remediation_tips: Implement MFA for all critical systems and user accounts.

criteria.description: MFA on some systems but not comprehensive
Comprehensive MFA across all critical systems

questions.scoring_instructions: Evaluate MFA implementation across systems and user accounts.

questions.title: Privileged Access Management
questions.description: Evaluates privileged access management and least privilege principles.
questions.remediation_tips: Implement privileged access management and enforce least privilege principles.

criteria.description: No privileged access management or controls
Some privileged access controls but gaps exist

questions.scoring_instructions: Assess privileged access management and least privilege implementation.

questions.title: User Lifecycle Management
questions.description: Evaluates user account lifecycle management and access provisioning.
questions.remediation_tips: Implement automated user lifecycle management and access provisioning.

criteria.description: No user lifecycle management or automation

questions.scoring_instructions: Evaluate user lifecycle management and access provisioning processes.

questions.title: Identity Governance & Compliance
questions.description: Assesses identity governance and compliance with access control policies.
questions.remediation_tips: Implement identity governance and regular access reviews.

criteria.description: No identity governance or access reviews
Comprehensive identity governance and regular reviews

questions.scoring_instructions: Assess identity governance and access review processes.
